Sentencas: Ammonia (NH3) is considered a potential energy carrier to be used as a fuel in energy conversion devices, such as solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: Vanadium (oxy)nitride as a new category of anode for direct ammonia solid oxide fuel cells cells

Sentencas: Nonetheless, in the presence of NH3, traditional Ni-containing anodes may suffer from poor chemical stability, resulting in its partial conversion to nickel nitride.
Titulo: Vanadium (oxy)nitride as a new category of anode for direct ammonia solid oxide fuel cells cells

Sentencas: We, therefore, propose a new composite anode for direct ammonia solid oxide fuel cells made of a metallic conducting phase, vanadium (oxy) nitride (VON), and an oxygen-ion conducting phase, (ZrO2)(0.92)(Y2O3)(0.08) (YSZ).
Titulo: Vanadium (oxy)nitride as a new category of anode for direct ammonia solid oxide fuel cells cells

Sentencas: X-ray diffraction (XRD) reveals that the VON material is chemically compatible with YSZ.
Titulo: Vanadium (oxy)nitride as a new category of anode for direct ammonia solid oxide fuel cells cells

Sentencas: Good thermal stability was also shown under reducing conditions by thermogravimetry (TGA).
Titulo: Vanadium (oxy)nitride as a new category of anode for direct ammonia solid oxide fuel cells cells

Sentencas: Electrochemical impedance spectroscopy (EIS) showed that peak performing composition is composed of 50:50% vol of VON:YSZ at 850 degrees C, yielding comparable performance to that of previous reports on traditional Ni-YSZ cermets.
Titulo: Vanadium (oxy)nitride as a new category of anode for direct ammonia solid oxide fuel cells cells

Sentencas: The electrode mechanism under NH3 fuel was found to be similar to that of traditional Ni-based cermet compositions using hydrogen fuel, due to the predicted thermal decomposition of ammonia under the studied operation temperatures, i.e., >= 650 degrees C, while sensitivity to flow rate considerations was also highlighted.
Titulo: Vanadium (oxy)nitride as a new category of anode for direct ammonia solid oxide fuel cells cells

Sentencas: To the best of our knowledge, this work reports a completely new category of anodes for SOFC applications.
Titulo: Vanadium (oxy)nitride as a new category of anode for direct ammonia solid oxide fuel cells cells
